answers.answer: Have you been checked for diabetes? Your symptoms point toward that actually, I would get checked, have a fasting glucose level blood draw and an A1C to see exactly where you are.
thank you that helps alot i will see if i can get it done asap.. you an get them done at a local chemist cant you?
Some labs will let you prescibed them for yourself, but a lot of them require a doctors prescription before they will draw the blood and do the tests.
